name: Buana Bali Luxury Villas
address: Jl. Raya Puri Gading II, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Buana Bali Luxury Villa is an upscale accommodation located in Jimbaran, Bali, Indonesia. Situated in the southern part of Bali, Jimbaran is renowned for its beautiful beaches, fresh seafood restaurants, and stunning sunset views.

Buana Bali Luxury Villa offers guests a private and luxurious retreat with spacious villas and upscale amenities. Typically, these villas feature modern Balinese architecture, elegant furnishings, and private pools surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Guests can expect a range of amenities such as fully-equipped kitchens, stylish living areas, en-suite bathrooms, and outdoor dining spaces.

The villa staff provides personalized service, including daily housekeeping, private chefs upon request, and assistance with arranging activities or excursions in the surrounding area. Some villas may also offer additional facilities such as spa services, fitness centers, or entertainment rooms.

The location of Buana Bali Luxury Villa in Jimbaran allows guests to explore the nearby attractions easily. This includes Jimbaran Beach, famous for its soft sands and seafood restaurants, as well as nearby cultural sites, shopping centers, and water sports activities.

Overall, Buana Bali Luxury Villa offers discerning travelers a peaceful and indulgent escape in one of Bali's most sought-after destinations, with all the comforts and conveniences of a luxurious private villa experience.
review 2:
The a.c is not working
Tried to check with reception, she told they cant so anything and will only be able to help only in the day. Also, said they cant provide fan either! It's super hot in end of april and worst hotel ever.
Update: after complaining multiple times, they atleast tried to fix a.c and provided the fan.
review 3:
Overall it was a comfortable stay. The wifi was decent and AC worked well. The location wasn‚Äôt the best as it seemed like a pretty residential area without much shops around. We had to take a bike if we wanted to go anywhere.

The major drawback was that the rooms were pretty run down looking and it wasn‚Äôt the cleanest. I found a dead cockroach on the floor under the vanity in the bedroom as soon as I checked in. There was another one in the kitchen cupboards. Ants would also come in as they please and I woke up with 7 bites on my ankle after the first night.
review 4: We did enjoy the privacy. A bit run down. Water pressure from the shower was great though. Pool was really dirty. We didn't use it because it was so dirty. I suppose you pay what you get.
review 5:
Enjoyed my stay here. Great private pool experience.

The surrounding was quite too. Staff was polite.

Not much choices for breakfast yet the fried rice ordered was tasty (comes with fruits and keropok).

Location is near the residential area. Mini mart are available in walking distance and you can also find some cafes and warung for food.

name: Soobali Ocean Villa
address: Pantai Balangan, 54RW+7Q9, Kuta Selatan, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: It is more appropriate for party house and not for families with kids, as it is a bit far from the main roads, there is havy, noisy traffic full day and night, there is no aircon in the livingrooms but many geccos living there. The English knowlidge of the host lady was very limited, so we had to find out everything. The house is huge but 80% are the non-airconditioned livingrooms and gym. The pool is cool. The house is well equiped and the furnitures were in good condition.
review 2: A spacious, light and airy retreat. Perfect for family and small group up to 20 people. The house manager, Fatima is amazing, very helpful not to mention her cooking skill. There's small things here and there that sparks joy and resort feeling everywhere in this villa. Love the game room with smart curved tv, home gym and table pool too! The pool is best when paired with bright sunny day overlooking the ocean view.
review 3: Amazing place to stay. It is easy to find. Beautiful setting with palatial rooms.  Couldn't fault the service from the staff. Children friendly with high chairs, travel cots, car seats and pool fence - and staff which were happy to play and baby sit. I would love to go again.
review 4: Best luxury villa with beautiful infinity pool and spectacular views üëåüèº üòé
review 5: Great family Villa around Uluwatu and Nusa dua area. Got a very nice ocean view. Friendly and professional staff there. There have a good game room, billiards, fitness equipment, swimming pool. Highly recommend

name: Villa Sanjaya
address: 68, Jl. Tundun Penyu Dipal, Ungasan, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The 8Teen Villa, i just visit and inspection the villa. This is a super wonderful place to be with family and friends. Beautiful sunset and also perfect for barbecue at 2nd floor terrace. The staff it self is great, they stay in the lower floor (basement of garage) which is good so it assure whenever we need help, they will able to be call at anytime.
review 2: Access to this place from main road was tedious. Apart from that enjoyed the stay. The housekeeper Nur was really helpful and supportive.
review 3: It is an amazing 4 bedroom villa with a swimming pool. It is slightly away from the main city.
review 4: Cozy place. Friendly n helpful lady taker

name: Villa Leana
address: Jl. Pantai Balangan I, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The four of us got in the villa midnight and since then supada and his colleague made us feel like at home. This is amazing property and loved our stay and it made our trip memorable
review 2: Nice place to stay with your family and friend. They have a nice and helpful staffs. You must try the experience to stay and meet pak supadan, ibu Kadek and Wayan. üòòüòòüòòüòò
review 3: A really comfortable, gorgeous villa with great views over the cliffs to the sea. Our party of ten enjoyed the house, the friendly staff and surroundings very very much. The fact that it's quite secluded and far from the local tourist crowd was a plus for me, though it was a little to far to the nearest quick shop for my liking. An added convenience was the driver who took us anywhere we liked given the time to arrange things. Sunset from the pool was amazing.  Such a good choice for your stay in Jimbaran. I would certainly stay here again.
review 4:
We had an amazing week at Villa Leana. We enjoyed amazing food, friendly and unobtrusive service and all in all enjoyed some wonderfully relaxing family time.

The house is luxurious and beautiful with great views, the rooms are large, clean and comfortable.

Although the house is stunning, it is most definitely the wonderful staff, Supada and Kadek, who make the whole experience amazing.
review 5:
This villa surpassed our expectations.  It's stunning and grand.  The staff are amazing, welcoming, intuitive and such a pleasure to meet.

This place is perfect for families as they have a gated pool and stairs.

My daughter loved the turtles, especially holding the baby turtle.  Such a lovely villa and staff.  This place won't dissapoint.

review 1: Really tasty and good portion for the price. The Gochujang chicken is a favourite for sure. Should try and add a sweet and sour to the menu
review 2: Only takeaway, delicious food and good price!

The property needs a bit of maintenance, otherwise no complaints

name: Frangipani Villa Ungasan Bali
address: 54RW+5XP, Jl. Tundun Penyu Dipal, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The best place in Bali ‚ù§Ô∏è
Incredible view! So clean and new ! A lot of cozy details in interior, bamboo trees, and green territory with two terraces üí´
review 2: Cool Bali design Villa with nice sunset view
review 3: Nice villa, with private pool, there is a cooker madam if you want breakfast, recommended.
review 4:
Great views, pool, grass area and location.

Maid that cooks and cleans on site was amazing - but door handles are falling off, tap handles fell off, kitchen is out dated and owners who live in Jakarta harrassed us for payment through messages as soon as we arrived when we were told we would pay at the end of the stay.

House needs a few things fixed and a new kitchen and could be a 5 star
review 5: Nice view and design, the villa looks old but the cleanliness still ok

name: Buana Residence
address: 54VX+VW8, Gg. Tresna Asih, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
This place is more like a house, rather than a apartment. It has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom, and a kitchen. Also a semi-outdoor space for chillin. I'm not sure about monthly rent, but it is available for yearly rent. It's quite nice. There are few furnitures and amenities already, like beds and pillows in each room, a small fridge, a single gas stove, 2 wardrobe cabinet, a water heater in one of the bathroom, 2 unit AC, and the ratan sofa set.

For electricity, you pay it by buying pulsa. For water, you pay it monthly to the owner. Never have issues with water here. It's even very strong!

The owner is also very nice and helpful. Before we moved in, he bought new bed sheets, clean the AC, and willing to paint some of the walls. He's also very helpful whenever you have some issues. The area is pretty quiet. There's plenty of good yet cheap food around. It's also not far from the local market and other areas. It's also not difficult to find by delivery men and food deliveries.

name: Villa Timbangan
address: Jl. Tundun Penyu Dipal No.No, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Cozy place & far from noisy & busy streets.

2 stories building with pool & very beautiful view.

The villa has 3 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms. Kitchen for cooking. Perfect for families/ large parties

address: Jl. Blong Bidadari No.1, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Very good villa with big pool, big living room and kitchen and nice rooms. Staff is also great üòÅ
review 2: a really cozy place with a great view. the location is strategic and close with many shops. the pool is nice
review 3: Nice place, greta view, affdorable rent price

address: 54QX+J72, Jl. Tundun Penyu, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Great villa to stay. Staff working well and very helpfull. Bug pool, big lounge. Everything is big here. Also has view to the ocean!
review 2:
Very nice villa with amazing view.
Big pool with sunset point.
Big nice rooms.
Smart TV connected with fast internet
Very recommending
review 3: A perfect place to stay in Bali. Away from the crowded traffic, enjoy your own world

review 1: Scary stupid road, but fun to drive back up!! I think I found this back in 2016‚Ä¶
review 2: I'm surprised this place is even on Google Maps. It's just a road. Nothing here.
review 3: Just a dead end road, beter you go to melasti beach for quick climb
review 4: Free place with great view üòÅ for chilling or making photos

name: Villa Bukit Indah
address: Jl. Tundun Penyu Dipal, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Booked this place through aibnb for a stay here for two nights. The caretaker was such a nice guy. He offered to help us find the place and guided our taxi, then took us to rwnt bikes for ouselves. He even offered to give the bikes back for us whne leaving.
The villa is beautiful and clean, very spacious, it had two bedrooms with massive attached bathrooms, a fridge and drinking water(hot and cold). The kitchen has all amenities required.
The pool however was not cleaned regularly and the lightingin the pool doesnt work, that deterred us from using it. The villa is located on a hill and away from the noise and hustle bustle of the main areas but is not easily accessible.
review 2: Found this place on airbnb. Beautiful and extremely large villa with a private pool. There were just 3 of us staying here but this place is great for groups of upto six people too. The host is warm and friendly
review 3: Secluded but with 5 star facilities, not recommended for family with young children under 5yo

name: Villa Lebah
address: Jl. Pantai Balangan No.2011, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Best place for family outing, staff is very helpful
review 2: Very decent and well maintained place.

name: Krupuk
address: 55V3+J4Q, Jl. Bukit Bintang, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Cc mie & nasi campur jakarta
address: Jl. Puri Gading No.19 blok F18, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The noodles were great! The dim sum's taste has room for improvement in my opinion.
review 2: Ordered bakmi goreng babi. For 30k, the portion was big! The pork was nicely cooked and the meal over all was well seasoned. Maybe just a bit too salty for me. Will definitely come back and taste more dishes.
review 3:
Just Ordered Complete Hainan Rice
Big portion of Rice.
The protein more on mild flavor and complemented by the rice and the soup.
Shame, the notice board was on Close instead of being Open.
review 4: We‚Äôre regulars here since we live nearby. The bakmie campur is da bomb! Super yummy!
review 5: Great food, we ordered noodles, nasi campur, nasingoreng but the staffs are quite slow. We ordered foods and hot tea. Until we finished the food, the drink didnt serve on our table :(

name: Balconies Villa Bali
address: Blong Bidadari I No.99, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Huge villa with several rooms for rent with adjoining bathrooms. There is a spacious spa on the bottom level and a big shared kitchen and dining room. There's a great pool to cool of in and the living room has plenty of room for a whole family. A fabulous place to stay in the south of Bali
review 2:
Welcome to Balconies Villa Bali.  This stunning 6 bedroom, 7 bathroom private villa is available to hire.  Whole Villa rental.

Free airport transfers and continental breakfast daily.

Spa and massage treatment room on site.
review 3:
Spent time in balconies such as a unbelievable moment ever.
Quick place with lots of lamp view from Denpasar, watch the mountains, see the ocean and many thing  that you can see here.
I wake up at a heaven every morning
YOU WOULD LOVE IT!
review 4: Good villa and nice swimming pool

name: Bookit Backpacker Hostel
address: Jl. Puri Gading No.29 Blok G1, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Love this hostel and stayed here multiple times! The manager Ronny is the kindest person you will ever meet. He will tell you about all the best places to visit (including local tips), teach you how to ride a bike and show you how to eat tropical fruit properly! :D great location, however you will need a bike (which you can rent for cheap from the hostel). All beaches are a 5-10 minute ride away and there are loads of cheap food options nearby. Perfect place for backpackers!
review 2: A very clean hostel with amazing hot showers and the most comfortable beds. Really sociable common area and an owner with a heart of gold. Nice scooters and new helmets that actually fit!!! Lots of places to eat nearby and a short ride to many surfing beaches. I will deffinetly stay here again. Thanks!
review 3: I stayed there for 2 nights. And they were the best! Not only because Ronny is super nice and helpful but because of the people in there. We did so many things together and although I could ride a bike I met people who could take me in the back. The hostel is small but extremely social. Ronny went with us to have dinner and also to the fish market. It was a memorable experience staying there. All the rooms have AC and the beds are super comfortable and clean. There's small lockers for the important stuff and hot water, perfect place. Breakfast is included and I was so happy  it wasn't pancakes. There was bread, jam, peanut butter and raw eggs so each could cook them themselves. No shoes are allowed inside like in many other places in Indonesia. Also, Ronny picked me up at the airport at 2 am. I was just carrying a backpack so was super easy. I appreciate that, cause other travellers told me arriving in Denpasar airport is not a pleasant experience (taxi drivers harras you) So I was so happy that he was waiting for me even when my plane was kinda late. I'm actually planning on coming back in a few days. He has scooters for rent. And I will sure grab one this time.
review 4: Really nice hostel in Jimbaran, good service, clean, simple but sufficient breakfast, not expensive and a fantastic host. Just in the middle of the south part of Bali surrounded by all the beaches, but just outside all the buzz. The host Ronnie is a really nice guy and will arrange almost anything. Amazing view from the roof where I enjoyed a bintang almost every night. Ronnie knows all the local places from fishmarkets to the best beaches not know to tourists. I really enjoyed my stay here. 24/7 supermarket nearby with ATM.
review 5:
Staying here for 4nights. Ronny is the best. He showed us great places and hidden beaches. Very friendly.
The hostel was nice and clean. Breakfast were great. I met other guests from around the world and hangout together. Super fun. Definitely gonna come back!
